messages.description_nomic:
Text channel for communication without a microphone
Voice room ID: {0}
messages.set_channel_description: Voice channel `{0}` has been set as a parent.
messages.set_category_description: Category `{0}` has been set as the parent category.
messages.set_prefix_description: On this server, all commands are now prefixed with `{0}`
messages.reset_channel_description: Use `{0}channel CHANNELID` to select a new channel
messages.reset_category_description: Use `{0}category ID-CATEGORY` to select a new category
messages.reset_prefix_description:
The default prefix `{0}` is now used.
Use `{1}prefix CHAR` to select a new one
messages.reset_locale_description:
The default locale `{0}` is now used.
Use `{1}locale LANGUAGE` to select a different one
messages.hint_none_channel_description: For the bot to work properly, you need to set the parent channel, by entering which the user can create his own private voice channel. Set the parent channel with the command `{0}channel CHANNEL-ID`
messages.hint_none_category_description: For the bot to work properly, you need to set a parent category, within which a private channel will be created for the user. Set the parent category with the command `{0}category ID-CATEGORY`
messages.hint_none_prefix_description:
This server uses the default `{0}`.
To change it use `{1}prefix CHAR`
messages.hint_none_locale_description:
This server uses default `{0}`.
To change it use `{1}locale LANGUAGE`
messages.error_text_channel_description: The selected channel must be a voice channel.
messages.help_server: Commands must be run on the server
messages.help_cmd_channel:
Set parent channel
Must be a voice channel

messages.help_notice_id_category: Note that category name â‰  category ID
messages.forbidden_description: You must have **Administrator** right to set up private channels
messages.dm_description: Commands can only be executed while on the server
